013package org.apache.juneau.swap;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
017import java.lang.reflect.*;
018import java.util.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
026
027/**
028 * A dynamic object swap based on reflection of a Java class that converts Objects to Number serializable objects.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * Looks for methods on the class that can be called to swap-in surrogate Number objects before serialization and swap-out
032 * surrogate Number objects after parsing.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='figure'>Valid surrogate objects</h5>
035 * <ul>
036 *    <li class='jc'>Any subclass of {@link Number}
037 *    <li class='jc'>Any number primitive
038 * </ul>
039 *
040 * <h5 class='figure'>Valid swap methods (S = Swapped type)</h5>
041 * <ul>
042 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toNumber()</c>
043 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toNumber(BeanSession)</c>
044 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toInteger()</c>
045 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toInteger(BeanSession)</c>
046 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toInt()</c>
047 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toInt(BeanSession)</c>
048 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toLong()</c>
049 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toLong(BeanSession)</c>
050 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toFloat()</c>
051 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toFloat(BeanSession)</c>
052 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toDouble()</c>
053 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toDouble(BeanSession)</c>
054 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toShort()</c>
055 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toShort(BeanSession)</c>
056 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toByte()</c>
057 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> S toByte(BeanSession)</c>
058 * </ul>
059 *
060 * <h5 class='figure'>Valid unswap methods (N = Normal type, S = Swapped type)</h5>
061 * <ul>
062 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromInteger(S)</c>
063 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromInteger(BeanSession, S)</c>
064 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromInt(S)</c>
065 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromInt(BeanSession, S)</c>
066 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromLong(S)</c>
067 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromLong(BeanSession, S)</c>
068 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromFloat(S)</c>
069 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromFloat(BeanSession, S)</c>
070 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromDouble(S)</c>
071 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromDouble(BeanSession, S)</c>
072 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromShort(S)</c>
073 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromShort(BeanSession, S)</c>
074 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromByte(S)</c>
075 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N fromByte(BeanSession, S)</c>
076 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N create(S)</c>
077 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N create(BeanSession, S)</c>
078 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N valueOf(S)</c>
079 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public static</jk> N valueOf(BeanSession, S)</c>
080 *    <li class='jm'><c><jk>public</jk> N(S)</c>
081 * </ul>
082 * <p>
083 * Classes are ignored if any of the following are true:
084 * <ul>
085 *    <li>Classes annotated with {@link BeanIgnore @BeanIgnore}.
086 *    <li>Non-static member classes.
087 * </ul>
088 *
089 * <p>
090 * Members/constructors are ignored if any of the following are true:
091 * <ul>
092 *    <li>Members/constructors annotated with {@link BeanIgnore @BeanIgnore}.
093 *    <li>Deprecated members/constructors.
094 * </ul>
095 *
096 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
097 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/SwapBasics">Swaps</a>
098 * </ul>
099 *
100 * @param <T> The normal class type.
101 */
102public class AutoNumberSwap<T> extends ObjectSwap<T,Number> {
103
104   private static final Set<String>
105      SWAP_METHOD_NAMES = u(set("toNumber", "toInteger", "toInt", "toLong", "toFloat", "toDouble", "toShort", "toByte")),
106      UNSWAP_METHOD_NAMES = u(set("fromInteger", "fromInt", "fromLong", "fromFloat", "fromDouble", "fromShort", "fromByte", "create", "valueOf"));
107
108   /**
109    * Look for constructors and methods on this class and construct a dynamic swap if it's possible to do so.
110    *
111    * @param bc The bean context to use for looking up annotations.
112    * @param ci The class to try to constructor a dynamic swap on.
113    * @return An object swap instance, or <jk>null</jk> if one could not be created.
114    */
115   @SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes" })
116   public static ObjectSwap<?,?> find(BeanContext bc, ClassInfo ci) {
117
118      if (shouldIgnore(bc, ci))
119         return null;
120
121      // Find swap() method if present.
122      for (MethodInfo m : ci.getMethods()) {
123
124         if (isSwapMethod(bc, m)) {
125
126            ClassInfo rt = m.getReturnType();
127
128            MethodInfo mi = ci.getMethod(x -> isUnswapMethod(bc, x, ci, rt));
129            if (mi != null)
130               return new AutoNumberSwap(bc, ci, m, mi, null);
131
132            ConstructorInfo cs = ci.getDeclaredConstructor(x -> isUnswapConstructor(bc, x, rt));
133            if (cs != null)
134               return new AutoNumberSwap(bc, ci, m, null, cs);
135
136            return new AutoNumberSwap(bc, ci, m, null, null);
137         }
138      }
139
140      return null;
141   }
142
143   private static boolean shouldIgnore(BeanContext bc, ClassInfo ci) {
144      return
145         ci.hasAnnotation(bc, BeanIgnore.class)
146         || ci.isNonStaticMemberClass()
147         || ci.isPrimitive()
148         || ci.isChildOf(Number.class);
149   }
150
151   private static boolean isSwapMethod(BeanContext bc, MethodInfo mi) {
152      ClassInfo rt = mi.getReturnType();
153      return
154         mi.isNotDeprecated()
155         && mi.isNotStatic()
156         && mi.isVisible(bc.getBeanMethodVisibility())
157         && (rt.isChildOf(Number.class) || (rt.isPrimitive() && rt.isAny(int.class, short.class, long.class, float.class, double.class, byte.class)))
158         && mi.hasName(SWAP_METHOD_NAMES)
159         && mi.hasFuzzyParamTypes(BeanSession.class)
160         && mi.hasNoAnnotation(bc, BeanIgnore.class);
161   }
162
163   private static boolean isUnswapMethod(BeanContext bc, MethodInfo mi, ClassInfo ci, ClassInfo rt) {
164      return
165         mi.isNotDeprecated()
166         && mi.isStatic()
167         && mi.isVisible(bc.getBeanMethodVisibility())
168         && mi.hasName(UNSWAP_METHOD_NAMES)
169         && mi.hasFuzzyParamTypes(BeanSession.class, rt.inner())
170         && mi.hasReturnTypeParent(ci)
171         && mi.hasNoAnnotation(bc, BeanIgnore.class);
172   }
173
174   private static boolean isUnswapConstructor(BeanContext bc, ConstructorInfo cs, ClassInfo rt) {
175      return
176         cs.isNotDeprecated()
177         && cs.isVisible(bc.getBeanConstructorVisibility())
178         && cs.hasMatchingParamTypes(rt)
179         && cs.hasNoAnnotation(bc, BeanIgnore.class);
180   }
181
182   //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
183
184   private final Method swapMethod, unswapMethod;
185   private final Constructor<?> unswapConstructor;
186   private final Class<?> unswapType;
187
188   private AutoNumberSwap(BeanContext bc, ClassInfo ci, MethodInfo swapMethod, MethodInfo unswapMethod, ConstructorInfo unswapConstructor) {
189      super(ci.inner(), swapMethod.inner().getReturnType());
190      this.swapMethod = bc.getBeanMethodVisibility().transform(swapMethod.inner());
191      this.unswapMethod = unswapMethod == null ? null : bc.getBeanMethodVisibility().transform(unswapMethod.inner());
192      this.unswapConstructor = unswapConstructor == null ? null : bc.getBeanConstructorVisibility().transform(unswapConstructor.inner());
193
194      Class<?> unswapType = null;
195      if (unswapMethod != null) {
196         for (ParamInfo pi : unswapMethod.getParams())
197            if (! pi.getParameterType().is(BeanSession.class))
198               unswapType = pi.getParameterType().getWrapperIfPrimitive();
199      } else if (unswapConstructor != null) {
200         for (ParamInfo pi : unswapConstructor.getParams())
201            if (! pi.getParameterType().is(BeanSession.class))
202               unswapType = pi.getParameterType().getWrapperIfPrimitive();
203      }
204      this.unswapType = unswapType;
205   }
206
207   @Override /* ObjectSwap */
208   public Number swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
209      try {
210         return (Number)swapMethod.invoke(o, getMatchingArgs(swapMethod.getParameterTypes(), session));
211      } catch (Exception e) {
212         throw SerializeException.create(e);
213      }
214   }
215
216   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
217   @Override /* ObjectSwap */
218   public T unswap(BeanSession session, Number o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
219      if (unswapType == null)
220         throw new ParseException("No unparse methodology found for object.");
221      try {
222         Object o2 = ConverterUtils.toType(o, unswapType);
223         if (unswapMethod != null)
224            return (T)unswapMethod.invoke(null, getMatchingArgs(unswapMethod.getParameterTypes(), session, o2));
225         if (unswapConstructor != null)
226            return (T)unswapConstructor.newInstance(o2);
227         return super.unswap(session, o, hint);
228      } catch (Exception e) {
229         throw ParseException.create(e);
230      }
231   }
232}
